headline: Is C.H. Robinson (CHRW) Turning AI Disruption Fears Into a Competitive Edge and Capital Return Story?
summary: C.H. Robinson Worldwide recently faced intense scrutiny over the potential impact of artificial intelligence on freight logistics, while its board affirmed a regular quarterly cash dividend of US$0.63 per share payable on April 2, 2026, to shareholders of record on March 6, 2026. The company and several research firms have responded by emphasizing C.H. Robinson’s long-running investment in AI tools and automation as a potential competitive strength rather than a vulnerability. We’ll now...
